thread.title: Factorian - Minimal Factory & Industry WordPress Theme (Business)
thread.title_full: Factorian - Minimal Factory & Industry WordPress Theme (Business)

author: crazycafe
title: Factorian - Minimal Factory & Industry WordPress Theme (Business)
text:
Add to Collection 
With simple but modern slick design, Factorian WordPress theme reflects professionalism with its design, while being super efficient as a WordPress theme itself. Though the theme is named and is themed with a focus on factories, industries, distributors, manufacturers, etc.; the theme is so customisable that it can be turned into anything and hence is a complete one-stop business theme for any kind of business. 
Anyone with simple WordPress knowledge can easily customise everything in this theme, without any sort of coding! Drag and drop function, self explanatory theme option panel and widget ready functionality makes the theme awesome in every aspect. Coding standard is maintained everywhere and is coded in an SEO friendly manner. Forever, the theme is completely translation ready and can be translated through WPML plugin or manually or any other possible way. 
Need a complete business theme that allows you to create an awesome website for your company within a few hours? Factorian WordPress theme is all you need! Awesome Features
